title: Welcome to the Desktop
excerpt: A quick tour of the draggable window interface.
content:
This project simulates a tiny OS-like desktop. Windows can be dragged, resized and the layout persists using localStorage.

Open panels with the dock buttons below.

title: Particles & Performance
excerpt: How the background particles adapt to theme and motion preferences.
content: The canvas particle system reduces count when the user prefers reduced motion. Colors shift based on dark/light theme.

title: Accessibility Touches
excerpt: Focus management, keyboard shortcuts and ARIA notes.
content:
• Global Escape closes top window
  • Alt+Number opens specific sections
  • Lightbox traps focus while open

title: Audio & SFX System
excerpt: A single audio element powers all UI sounds.
content: SFX are serialized through one element to avoid overlapping unmanaged sounds. Open/close & click events trigger respective cues.

title: Planned Improvements
content:
1. Window tiling / snapping presets
  2. Theme editor (custom palette)
  3. Offline content manifest
  4. Animated task switcher
